attributes.action: Reject PL B Teams In Football League
attributes.additional_details:
The FA have today launched plans to introduce Premier League B teams into a new league within the football pyramid.

This will have detrimental affects to all lower league sides from a financial aspect to possible stadium moves to allow B teams to compete. Lower league youngsters will also be tapped up to fill these B teams, making it harder to compete and gulfs between PL and FL will become wider.

We already have Champtionship, League 1 and League 2 sides that can be used as feeder clubs for PL stars rather than PL sides gaining extra income.

As a lower football league fan we urge everyone to sign this so that the football hierarchy understand the anger and dismay we have towards their plans.

Please sign and stop this madness!
